Prototype 1 Python/Django - Blog - Wail El Majdoubi documentation
=================================================================

This is the documentation for my Django blog application. It allows users to create, read, update, and delete blog posts. It also includes a user authentication system with login and signup functionalities.

Add your content using ``reStructuredText`` syntax. See the
`reStructuredText <https://www.sphinx-doc.org/en/master/usage/restructuredtext/index.html>`_
documentation for details.
